author: kevaundray
content:
It might make sense to split this PR into two:

- First one to push just the bug fix in a naive way (without breaking any assumptions the library is making for example)
- Second to make improvements on the code

author: sky.cactus
content: I'm a huge fan of this strategy in general for PRs.  Code cleanup/refactoring in separate PRs from bug fixes in separate PRs from feature additions is great for reviewability.
